thread.title: How to Make Chicken Piccata That's Crispy, Buttery, and Bright as Sunshine
thread.title_full: How to Make Chicken Piccata That's Crispy, Buttery, and Bright as Sunshine

author: Daniel Gritzer
title: How to Make Chicken Piccata That's Crispy, Buttery, and Bright as Sunshine
text: Chicken piccata takes a beloved food—pan-fried chicken cutlets—and tops it with a simple but luxurious lemon-butter pan sauce. The result is a flavor and texture festival that blends crispness, juiciness, richness, and tartness all into one. Read More
